name: karakeep-homedash
description: Karakeep Homedash is a personal dashboard for managing smart home or server resources. It displays widgets, stats and quick links, letting users build a customized control panel for self hosted services.
features: Customizable Dashboard: Drag-and-drop widgets and personalized layout configuration. Build your ideal control center.
Service Links: Quick access bookmarks to all your self-hosted services. Navigate your infrastructure easily.
Status Monitoring: Real-time health checks and uptime displays for services. Monitor availability at a glance.
Smart Home Controls: Integrate with home automation platforms for device management. Control lights, sensors, and more.
Resource Metrics: Display CPU, memory, disk, and network usage statistics. Track server performance.
Weather Widget: Local weather information and forecasts on your dashboard. Stay informed about conditions.
Calendar Integration: View upcoming events and appointments from calendar services. Keep track of your schedule.
RSS Feeds: Display news and updates from favorite RSS sources. Stay informed without leaving your dashboard.
Custom Themes: Choose from multiple themes or create custom color schemes. Match your aesthetic preferences.
Multi-User: Separate dashboards and preferences for different household members. Personalized experience for everyone.
